original_text: And it came to pass, that, as Jesus sat at meat in his house, many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples: for there were many, and they followed him.
korean_text: 그의 집에 앉아 잡수실 때에 많은 세리와 죄인들이 예수와 그의 제자들과 함께 앉았으니 이는 그러한 사람들이 많이 있어서 예수를 따름이러라

sentences.original_text: that, as Jesus sat at meat in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 예수께서 그의 집에서 식사하며 앉아 계실 때

sentences.original_text: many publicans and sinners sat also together
